projectName.description: Project name of the trusted payment

amountInCents.description: The maximum amount of the trusted payment. If this amount is reached the total amount will be transferred to the creditor.

minumumAmountInCents.description: The minimum amount of the trusted payment. If this amount is reached on the end date of the trusted payment the total amount will be transferred to the creditor.

endDate.description: The end date of the trusted payment. If the amount requirements are not met before this date the transfer is canceled and the clients are reimbursed. Format: dd/MM/yyyy

creditorPayments.description: This list contains the details of the outgoing payments that will be wired when the minimum requirements are met. At least one should be present.

notifyOfPaymentReceived.description: Notifications should be sent when there is a pay-in, cancellation or success for this Digitrust. True by default.

validate.description: Boolean indicating if you want to execute the transfer (true) or cancel the transfer(false). Canceling will reimburse the clients.

transferPayments.description: List of outgoing payments to perform when this transfer will be confirmed. There should at least be one payment.

actors.description: List of actors participating in the transfer. There will typically be a buyer and a seller as actor but any combination can do. There should at least be one actor to receive the funds.

hidePaymentDetails.description: True if the details of the outgoing payments should not be displayed to the buyer, false otherwise. This is useful for example when there is a commission planned but you do not want this to be disclosed to the buyer.

confirmedBuyer.description: True if the buyer has confirmed he wants to buy, false otherwise (default is true).

delayToCollect.description: The number of calendar days after the transfer was confirmed on which the money will be withdrawn from the buyers account. This only applies if this transfer is linked to a buffer account. Default is 60 days.

ibansToValidate.description: IBANs of the bank accounts associated to the company. You do not need to have verified that the company has access to these IBANs, Digiteal will take care of that. If you are sure, provide them in the ibans property.

type.description: COMPANY, PERSON or NONE if this email is not linked to a user that confirmed his email address

companyStatus.description: represents the status of the company within digiteal: NONE = unknown, NOT_ACTIVATED = Digiteal's terms and conditions have not been accepted yet, ON_HOLD = not active as issuer , PROD = active as issuer

vatNumber.description: VAT number of the concerned company

id.description: The Digiteal ID of the company

personStatus.description: represents the status of the person within Digiteal: NOT_FOUND: No user with this email address registered in Digiteal, COMPANY: This email address is linked to a company, NOT_ACTIVATED: his email address has not been confirmed, ACTIVATED: his email address has been confirmed but he did not finish the KYC, DEACTIVATED: he deleted his account in Digiteal, PENDING: he finished his KYC and his information is being reviewed by Digiteal, OK: His KYC has been checked, he is ready to perform payments, EXPIRED: His KYC information has expired.

percentage.description: Percentage of the trusted payment that will be transferred to this creditor. Default is 100. The percentage can contain at most 6 numbers behind the decimal point

creditorIBAN.description: IBAN value of the creditor on which the the amount will be wired when the minimum requirements are met.

amountInCents.description: The amount of the payment in cents. The currency is EUR.

conditional.description: True if the payment should be executed only after all the deciding actors have agreed. Otherwise, the payment will be executed as soon as the funds have been collected, for example as an advance payment. Default is true.

hidden.description: True if the payment should not be visible to the actors, for example in case of a commission that should not be disclosed to the customer. Otherwise, the payment details will be visible to all the actors.

creditorEmail.description: The email address of the creditor. The default IBAN of the creditor will be used. Please only provide a single identifier in this entity: creditorEmail, creditorVatNumber, creditorIdentificationNumber or creditorIBAN.

creditorVatNumber.description: The VAT number of the creditor. The default IBAN of the creditor will be used. Please only provide a single identifier in this entity: creditorEmail, creditorVatNumber, creditorIdentificationNumber or creditorIBAN.

creditorIdentificationNumber.description: Identification number of the creditor. The default IBAN of the creditor will be used. Please only provide a single identifier in this entity: creditorEmail, creditorVatNumber, creditorIdentificationNumber or creditorIBAN (see the company identification number documentation)

creditorIBAN.description: The IBAN of the creditor. This IBAN should be linked to one of the actors. Please only provide a single identifier in this entity: creditorEmail, creditorVatNumber, creditorIdentificationNumber or creditorIBAN.

communication.description: The communication that will be used in the payment. This will be visible in the bank statements of the creditor. Please use only ASCII characters here. Non ASCII will be simplified or removed to be sent through the banking channels.

comment.description: A comment about this payment. This will not be visible to the creditor.

subPayments.description: The optional sub payments that compose this payment. The amount of the sub payments will be deducted from this payment. So in case of a parent payment of 50 and a subpayment of 20. The payout for the parent payment will be of only 30 (50-20).

notifyOfPaymentReceived.description: Notifications should be sent when there is a pay-in to this Digitrust. True by default.

reference.description: A reference provided by the creator for this payment. This will not be visible to the creditor.

email.description: The email address of the actor. Please only provide a single identifier in this entity: email, vatNumber, identificationNumber, mandateId or digitealIdentifier.

vatNumber.description: The VAT number of the actor. Please only provide a single identifier in this entity: email, vatNumber, identificationNumber, mandateId or digitealIdentifier.

identificationNumber.description: Identification number of the actor. Please only provide a single identifier in this entity: email, vatNumber, identificationNumber, mandateId or digitealIdentifier (see the company identification number documentation)

mandateId.description: The Digiteal identifier of the mandate used to identity this actor.  Please only provide a single identifier in this entity: email, vatNumber, identificationNumber, mandateId or digitealIdentifier.

digitealIdentifier.description: The Digiteal identifier of the person/company. Please only provide a single identifier in this entity: email, vatNumber, identificationNumber, mandateId or digitealIdentifier.

iban.description: The IBAN of the actor. This IBAN can later be used in the payments.

language.description: The language of this actor (EN, NL or FR). Default value is EN.

decide.description: True if this actor should decide if this Digitrust should be executed or not. False if he does not decide. True by default.

reference.description: The reference of the transfer payment to update

subReference.description: The reference of the sub transfer payment to add if any (used to reference a partial payout)

amountInCents.description: The updated amount of the payment in cents. The currency is EUR.

communication.description: The updated communiation to be used in this transfer. If no communication or a null communication are provided, the previous communication is kept.

creditorIBAN.description: The IBAN of the creditor account. If no IBAN is provided, the creditor will not be updated.

details.description: The name of the sector if OTHER was chosen or details about the chosen sector.

countryCode.description: Country code represented by the two letter country codes as defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

userAgent.description: User agent of the customer when he approved the contracts
userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; SM-G892A Build/NRD90M; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/60.0.3112.107 Mobile Safari/537.36

ipAddress.description: IP address of the customer when he approved the contracts

approvalDate.description: The date when the customer approved the Digiteal contracts. The expected format is YYYY-MM-DD

issuer.description: Should we notify the user when he has a new issuer (true by default)

autoPayment.description: Should we notify the user when an autopayment was performed  (true by default)

autoPaymentThreshold.description: Should we notify the user when an autopayment was not performed because it was above the threshold (true by default)

paymentIssue.description: Should we notify the user when a payment issue occurred (true by default)

push.description: Should we notify the user through push notifications (if he has installed the Digiteal app, true by default)

mail.description: Should we notify the user through email notifications (true by default)

pepCustomerExplanation.description: How is the person politically exposed ? This explanation should be provided only if the person is politically exposed.

birthDay.description: The date the person was born. The person should be at least 16 years old. The expected format is YYYY-MM-DD.

birthPlace.description: The place where the person was born (city and country).

gender.description: The gender of the person: MALE, FEMALE, UNKNOWN or NA

language.description: Language of the person. Authorized values are EN, FR, NL. Default value is 'EN'

integratorVATNumber.description: The VAT number of the invoice/payment integrator of this person if any. This value is overridden by the integratorIdentificationNumber so use one or the other.

integratorIdentificationNumber.description: Identification number of the invoice/payment integrator of this person if any. This value overrides the integratorVATNumber so use one or the other (see the company identification number documentation)

digitrustIntegratorVATNumber.description: The VAT number of the DigiTrust integrator of this person if any. This value is overridden by the digitrustIntegratorIdentificationNumber so use one or the other.

digitrustIntegratorIdentificationNumber.description: Identification number of the DigiTrust integrator of this person if any. This value overrides the digitrustIntegratorVATNumber so use one or the other (see the company identification number documentation)

ibans.description: IBANs of the bank accounts associated to the person. You must have verified that the person has access to these IBANs. If you are not sure, provide them in the ibansToValidate property.

ibansToValidate.description: IBANs of the bank accounts associated to the person. You do not need to have verified that the person has access to these IBANs, Digiteal will take care of that. If you are sure, provide them in the ibans property.

sectors.description: Sectors where the person is active

nationalities.description: Nationalities of the person. The nationalities are represented by the two letter country codes as defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

address.description: Address of residence of the person

idDocumentValidityEnd.description: Date of the end of validity of the provided id documents of the person

pepCustomerExplanation.description: How is the person politically exposed ? This explanation should be provided only if the person is politically exposed.

birthDay.description: The date the person was born. The person should be at least 16 years old. The expected format is YYYY-MM-DD.

birthPlace.description: The place where the person was born (city and country).

gender.description: The gender of the person: MALE, FEMALE, UNKNOWN or NA

deviceBrand.description: Terminal's brand. If your brand is not activated, contact support@digiteal.eu

deviceModel.description: If your model is not activated, contact support@digiteal.eu
deviceModel.title: Terminal's model

iban.description: Terminal's associated iban. If field left empty, the company default iban will be used

vatNumber.description: VAT number of the company (either Vat number or Identification number should be provided)

identificationNumber.description: Identification number of the company (either Vat number or Identification number should be provided) (see the company identification number documentation)

creationDate.description: The date when the company was created. The expected format is YYYY-MM-DD

contactPerson.description: Contact person of the company. This person must have the right to register the company in Digiteal. This person must either represent the company or have a delegation of power to register the company.

integratorVATNumber.description: The VAT number of the invoice/payment integrator of this company if any. This value is overridden by the integratorIdentificationNumber so use one or the other.", exampl

integratorIdentificationNumber.description: Identification number of the invoice/payment integrator of this company if any. This value overrides the integratorVATNumber so use one or the other (see the company identification number documentation)

digitrustIntegratorVATNumber.description: The VAT number of the DigiTrust integrator of this company if any. This value is overridden by the digitrustIntegratorIdentificationNumber so use one or the other.

digitrustIntegratorIdentificationNumber.description: Identification number of the DigiTrust integrator of this company if any. This value overrides the digitrustIntegratorVATNumber so use one or the other (see the company identification number documentation)

pack.description: The pack chosen by the company to register. The DISCOVER pack is free but it does not enable collecting funds. The first pack to enable collecting funds is the START pack.

settlementGrouping.description: Settlement grouping strategy. This defines how the funds should be settled to the bank account of the creditor. PER_TX means that each transactions leads to a specific settlement. You will then have one line in your bank statement per transaction. PER_DAY, PER_WEEK and PER_MONTH means that the settlements will be grouped per day/week/month. Default is PER_TX.

address.description: The main address of the company.

sectors.description: Sectors where the company is active

ibans.description: IBANs of the bank accounts associated to the company. You must have verified that the company has access to these IBANs. If you are not sure, provide them in the ibansToValidate property.

ibansToValidate.description: IBANs of the bank accounts associated to the company. You do not need to have verified that the company has access to these IBANs, Digiteal will take care of that. If you are sure, provide them in the ibans property.

paymentMethods.description: Payment methods to activate. If you wish to activate PIS_STANDARD (PSD2 payment initiation), VISA, MASTERCARD, CARTE_BLEUE, MAESTRO or PAYCONIQ, please contact support@digiteal.eu. By default, only DIGITEAL_STANDARD is actvated.

specVersion.description: Version of the spec used for validation

fieldName.description: Field name related to the error

location.description: Location of the error in the file

description.example: A buyer reference or purchase order reference MUST be provided.

linkedExceptionMessage.example: net.sf.saxon.trans.XPathException: A function that computes atomic values should use xsl:sequence rather than xsl:value-of

contributorIban.description: Iban of the creditor used to retrieve the funds. Must be identical to the Iban used in the payment to the creditor.

amountInCents.description: Amount to be refunded. The default value is the full amount of the payment to the creditor.

currency.description: The currency of the amount to be refunded based on the ISO 4217-alpha standard. The default value is EUR

communication.description: Communication of the refund payment specific for the creditor.
communication.example: Refund from payment {transfer payment subject} of {date} from {debtor}

reference.description: Identifier of the payment to the creditor to be refunded

paymentInternalId.description: Identification of the payment used for your reference (as defined by the creditor)

customerInternalId.description: Identification of the customer (as defined by the creditor)

paymentID.description: The unique identifier of the payment known by the requester

destinationBankAccount.description: The IBAN to which the payment has been executed

requestorID.description: The id of the requester that issued the invoice

requestorVAT.description: The VAT number of the requester that issued the invoice

requestorNationalIdentifier.description: The national identifier of the requester that issued the invoice

clientID.description: Client id (known to the requestor) of the person

amountInCents.description: The amount of the invoice in cents

currency.description: The currency of the payment (ISO 4217 Currency Codes)

paymentRequestDate.description: The date on which the invoice has been sent

paymentRequestDuedate.description: The due date of the invoice

purpose.description: The purpose based on the ISO 20022 standard

creditorReference.description: The reference used by the biller to reconcile the payment. This is also called the structured communication in Belgium. It can be left empty if the remittanceInfo is defined

remittanceInfo.description: An unstructured string that is used as communication in the payment. This information is only used if there is nol creditorReference. It can be left empty if the creditorReference is defined

paymentInternalId.description: The internal identifier of the payment as known by the creditor

amountInCents.description: Amount expressed in cents that has to be paid. If this is not provided for a confirmation-based trusted payment, the total amount of the trusted payment will be requested.

transferId.description: Uuid of the trusted payment as determined by Digiteal. If this value is used the creditor reference(s) are ignored.

name.description:
Cardholder's full name. Should contains first and last name of the cardholder.
Required if this information was not provided at PKey creation or if the 3dsConfig is defined.

emailAddress.description:
Cardholder's email.
 Required if the 3dsConfig is defined.

redirectUrl.description: Url to redirect to after the 3DS challenge completion

language.description: Display language for the 3DS challenge web page

ipAddress.description: IP address of the customer's device

userAgent.description: User agent of the customer's device

fingerPrintStatus.description: Status of the fingerprint request at PKey creation. Required only if the token is a PKey.

redirectUrl.description: Url to redirect to after the 3DS challenge completion

language.description: Display language for the 3DS challenge web page

ipAddress.description: IP address of the customer's device

userAgent.description: User agent of the customer's device

fingerPrintStatus.description: Status of the fingerprint request at PKey creation

vatNumber.description: VAT number of the supplier company. If it is not provided, the requester will be considered the supplier of the person/company to register.

customerId.description: Identifier of the customer used in the company

product.description: Product for which this pre-registration is initiated. Default is INVOICING.
enum: INVOICING, PAYMENT, DIGITRUST, PEPPOL, TERMS_TECH, ZOFINANCIALS

notificationSettings.description: Notification settings for this customer (these will be used only if this is a new user of Digiteal)

welcomeMessage.description: Specific welcome message that will be sent by email. Please be careful to send a message in the language of the customer.
welcomeMessage.example: YourTelecom invites you to use Digiteal to pay all your invoices in one click.

returnURL.description: Defines the url where Digiteal has to redirect the user when the customer has set his password. Maximum length of 255 characters.

complete.description: Defines if the pre-registration contains enough data to be evaluated by Digiteal's compliance dept. Default value is true. The evaluation will only take place if the contract approval data is provided.

Identifier.description: The identifier (legal entity only). The name or the identifier must be present, and are mutually exclusive.

type.description: The identifier type of the account holder. Can be LEI, BIC, or an [ISO 20022 ExternalOrganisationIdentification1Code type](https://www.iso20022.org/catalogue-messages/additional-content-messages/external-code-sets):  * `LEI`: Legal Entity Identifier  * `BIC`: Bank Identifier Code  * `BANK`: Bank Party Identification  * `BDID`: Business Domain Identifier  * `BOID`: Business Other Identification  * `CBID`: Central Bank Identification Number  * `CHID`: Clearing Identification Number  * `CINC`: Certificate of Incorporation Number  * `COID`: Country Identification Code  * `CUST`: Customer Number  * `DUNS`: Data Universal Numbering System  * `EMPL`: Employer Identification Number  * `GS1G`: GS1GLN Identifier  * `SREN`: SIREN  * `SRET`: SIRET  * `TXID`: Tax Identification Number

value.description: The identifier number of the account holder.

VopMatchResult.description: Result of the Verification of Payee (VoP) performed on the account holder.

result.description: The result of the VoP check.  * `MATCH`: your request matches perfectly the holder of the account  * `CLOSE_MATCH`: your request matches almost the holder of the account (name match only)  * `NO_MATCH`: your request does not match the holder of the account  * `VOP_NOT_SUPPORTED`: the account holder bank does not support VoP requests  * `ERROR`: an error has occured and we were not able to perform  the VoP request

BankAccountHolder.description: Details of the verified account holder. Provided on a 'MATCH' or 'CLOSE_MATCH'.

name.description: The actual or corrected account holder name.

BankDetails.description: Details of the account holder's bank.

bic.description: The Business Identifier Code (BIC) of the account holder's bank.

name.description: The name of the account holder's bank.

uuid.description: The identifier of the pay-in once it has been initiated.

currency.description: The currency of the amount to be paid based on the ISO 4217-alpha standard. The default value is EUR

currentSpecVersion.description: Current version of the spec used for validation

futureSpecVersion.description: Future version of the spec used for warnings

contactPersons.description: Contact persons that you should contact in case of questions about the participant in the Peppol network

firstName.description: The first name of the UBO.

lastName.description: The last name of the UBO

pepRelated.description: True if the UBO is a PEP or PEP related

supplierIdentificationNUmber.description: Identification number of the supplier company (see the company identification number documentation)

customerId.description: Identifier of the customer used in the company
